title: "undefined index" errors when trying to sync calendar with android and caldav
body:
i'm using owncloud 4.5.2 on freebsd with postgres. i'm also using android, the android caldav app and am trying to sync 3 calendars, one of which is a shared calendar.

the following errors are logged in the php error log:

```
2012/11/15 16:41:49 [error] 38255#0: *1009 fastcgi sent in stderr: "sabre/backend.php on line 43
undefined index: userid in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/share/calendar.php on line 98
undefined index: id in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/share/calendar.php on line 97
undefined index: userid in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/share/calendar.php on line 98
undefined index: components in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 40
undefined index: userid in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 42
undefined index: uri in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 43
undefined index: userid in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 43
undefined index: id in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 46
undefined index: userid in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 48
undefined index: ctag in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 49
undefined index: displayname in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 54
undefined index: timezone in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 54
undefined index: calendarorder in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 54
undefined index: calendarcolor in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 54
undefined index: userid in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/share/calendar.php on line 98
undefined index: id in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/share/calendar.php on line 97
undefined index: userid in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/share/calendar.php on line 98
undefined index: components in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 40
undefined index: userid in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 42
undefined index: uri in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 43
undefined index: userid in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 43
undefined index: id in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 46
undefined index: userid in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 48
undefined index: ctag in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 49
undefined index: displayname in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 54
undefined index: timezone in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 54
undefined index: calendarorder in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 54
undefined index: calendarcolor in /usr/local/www/owncloud/apps/calendar/lib/sabre/backend.php on line 54" while reading response header from upstream, client: <myip>, server: <myserver>.net, request: "options /remote.php/caldav/calendars/me/someone_shared_by_someone/ http/1.1", upstream: "fastcgi://unix:/var/tmp/php-fpm.sock:", host: "<myserver>.net"```
